title: "Installation"
format: html
---

## Install from GitHub

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github('jeremiaheb/rvc')
```

You will not need to run the above code again after the initial download and install.

## Load library 

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
library(rvc)
```
